<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2763</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dolch Basic Word List</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dolch Grundlegende Wort-Liste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liste de base de Mot de Dolch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lista Básica Da Palavra De Dolch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lista Di base Di Parola Di Dolch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικός κατάλογος λέξης Dolch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lista Básica De la Palabra De Dolch</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a list of the 220 most read words which form basis of a vocabulary for lower 7 to 13 students.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading texts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">site words</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Liste der 220 gelesenen Wörter, 
die Grundlage eines Wortschatzes für unterere 7 bis 13 Kursteilnehmer
bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une liste des 220 mots les plus lus qui 
forment la base d'un vocabulaire pour les 7 à 13 étudiants 
inférieurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma lista das 220 palavras as mais lidas 
que dão forma à base de um vocabulário para uns 7 a 13 estudantes 
mais baixos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una lista delle 220 parole più colte che 
formano la base di un vocabolario per i 7 - 13 allievi più bassi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένας κατάλογος των 220 διαβασμένων 
λέξεων που αποτελούν τη βάση ενός λεξιλογίου για χαμηλότερους 7 
έως 13 σπουδαστές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una lista de las 220 palabras leídas que
forman base de un vocabulario para 7 a 13 estudiantes más bajos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesetexte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Site-Wörter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">textes de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mots de site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">textos da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">palavras do local</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">testi della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">parole del luogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κείμενα ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λέξεις περιοχών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">textos de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">palabras del sitio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
